MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY22 postcode area of Llanymynech, affecting properties in Trederwen Lane and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:45PM due to repairs required to a damaged overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 7:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:12PM on 6th April 2021.
